normalised: Hey everyone, ever wondered what makes things go crazy viral on social media these days? The latest trends in social media virality are, well, predictably unpredictable! From hilarious dance challenges inspired by a Bollywood hit like 'Pathaan' to heartwarming stories coming out of places like Lucknow, content is blowing up in all sorts of unexpected ways. Right now, short-form video is king, especially on platforms like Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts. Experts at I I M Ahmedabad are suggesting that authenticity and relatable content are key – think everyday struggles, desi humour, and genuine reactions. Forget perfectly polished ads; people are craving realness! Plus, localized content is seeing a huge surge. A regional meme from Chennai can now go global within hours. Remember that viral ‘Rasgulla’ debate? That kind of stuff! Basically, to get noticed, be real, be relevant, and maybe throw in a little Bollywood magic. Who knows, you might be the next viral sensation! Stay tuned for more on this crazy digital rollercoaster!
